overview:
Greg Huey, Business Development – Accelerators & Incubators, Amazon Web Services

Greg manages AWS’ relationships with startup accelerators and incubators. Based in Seattle, Greg has more than 15 years working with high growth companies as an entrepreneur, angel investor, venture capitalist, strategic acquirer and investment banker.

Prior to AWS, Greg was the President of glassybaby, a manufacturer, marketer and retailer of consumer products. Before taking the entrepreneurial leap, Greg invested and served on the board of directors at startups such as DocuSign and SnapIN during his tenure as the Managing Director of the Alliance of Angels and at Frazier Technology Ventures. In addition to working with startups in Seattle, Greg was with HP in London, GTCR in Chicago and Alex. Brown in Baltimore.

Greg has a B.S. in Finance from Georgetown University and a MBA from the Wharton School at the University of Pennsylvania.

http://www.linkedin.com/profile/view?id=68231&authType=name&authToken=U2hi&locale=enUS&pvs=pp&trk=pproviewmore
